00032 int ResponseCallbackAppend::response(uint64_t offset, uint32_t amount) {
00033   CommHeader header;
00034   header.initialize_from_request_header(m_event_ptr->header);
00035   CommBufPtr cbp( new CommBuf(header, 16) );
00036   cbp->append_i32(Error::OK);
00037   cbp->append_i64(offset);
00038   cbp->append_i32(amount);
00039   return m_comm->send_response(m_event_ptr->addr, cbp);
00040 }
